sn12.66:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kurūsu viharati kammāsadhammaṃ nāma kurūnaṃ nigamo.
sn12.66:1.8: Evaṃ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn12.66:1.10: “Yathā kathaṃ pana tvaṃ, bhikkhu, sammasasi antaraṃ sammasan”ti?
sn12.66:1.12: Yathā so bhikkhu byākāsi na so bhikkhu bhagavato cittaṃ ārādhesi.
sn12.66:2.1: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn12.66:2.3: yaṃ bhagavā antaraṃ sammasaṃ bhāseyya. Bhagavato sutvā bhikkhū dhāressantī”ti.
sn12.66:2.5: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ.
sn12.66:3.1: “Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammasamāno sammasati antaraṃ sammasaṃ:
sn12.66:3.2: ‘yaṃ kho idaṃ anekavidhaṃ nānappakārakaṃ dukkhaṃ loke uppajjati jarāmaraṇaṃ.
sn12.66:3.3: Idaṃ kho dukkhaṃ kiṃnidānaṃ kiṃsamudayaṃ kiṃjātikaṃ kiṃpabhavaṃ, kismiṃ sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hoti, kismiṃ asati jarāmaraṇaṃ na hotī’ti?
sn12.66:3.5: ‘yaṃ kho idaṃ anekavidhaṃ nānappakārakaṃ dukkhaṃ loke uppajjati jarāmaraṇaṃ.
sn12.66:3.6: Idaṃ kho dukkhaṃ upadhinidānaṃ upadhisamudayaṃ upadhijātikaṃ upadhipabhavaṃ, upadhismiṃ sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hoti, upadhismiṃ asati jarāmaraṇaṃ na hotī’ti.
sn12.66:3.7: So jarāmaraṇañca pajānāti jarāmaraṇasamudayañca pajānāti jarāmaraṇanirodhañca pajānāti yā ca jarāmaraṇanirodhasāruppagāminī paṭipadā tañca pajānāti.
sn12.66:3.9: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso sammā dukkhakkhayāya paṭipanno jarāmaraṇanirodhāya.
sn12.66:4.2: ‘upadhi panāyaṃ kiṃnidāno kiṃsamudayo kiṃjātiko kiṃpabhavo, kismiṃ sati upadhi hoti, kismiṃ asati upadhi na hotī’ti?
sn12.66:4.4: ‘upadhi taṇhānidāno taṇhāsamudayo taṇhājātiko taṇhāpabhavo, taṇhāya sati upadhi hoti, taṇhāya asati upadhi na hotī’ti.
sn12.66:4.5: So upadhiñca pajānāti upadhisamudayañca pajānāti upadhinirodhañca pajānāti yā ca upadhinirodhasāruppagāminī paṭipadā tañca pajānāti.
sn12.66:4.7: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso sammā dukkhakkhayāya paṭipanno upadhinirodhāya.
sn12.66:5.2: ‘taṇhā panāyaṃ kattha uppajjamānā uppajjati, kattha nivisamānā nivisatī’ti?
sn12.66:5.4: yaṃ kho loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati, ettha nivisamānā nivisati.
sn12.66:5.6: Cakkhuṃ loke piyarūpaṃ, sātarūpaṃ, etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati, ettha nivisamānā nivisati.
sn12.66:5.11: mano loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati ettha nivisamānā nivisati.
sn12.66:6.1: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atītamaddhānaṃ samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā yaṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ taṃ niccato addakkhuṃ sukhato addakkhuṃ attato addakkhuṃ ārogyato addakkhuṃ khemato addakkhuṃ.
sn12.66:6.3: Ye taṇhaṃ vaḍḍhesuṃ te upadhiṃ vaḍḍhesuṃ.
sn12.66:6.4: Ye upadhiṃ vaḍḍhesuṃ te dukkhaṃ vaḍḍhesuṃ.
sn12.66:6.5: Ye dukkhaṃ vaḍḍhesuṃ te na parimucciṃsu jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, na parimucciṃsu dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
sn12.66:7.1: Yepi hi keci, bhikkhave, anāgatamaddhānaṃ samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā yaṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ taṃ niccato dakkhissanti sukhato dakkhissanti attato dakkhissanti ārogyato dakkhissanti khemato dakkhissanti.
sn12.66:7.3: Ye taṇhaṃ vaḍḍhissanti te upadhiṃ vaḍḍhissanti.
sn12.66:7.4: Ye upadhiṃ vaḍḍhissanti te dukkhaṃ vaḍḍhissanti.
sn12.66:7.5: Ye dukkhaṃ vaḍḍhissanti te na parimuccissanti jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, na parimuccissanti dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
sn12.66:8.1: Yepi hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā yaṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ taṃ niccato passanti sukhato passanti attato passanti ārogyato passanti khemato passanti.
sn12.66:8.3: Ye taṇhaṃ vaḍḍhenti te upadhiṃ vaḍḍhenti.
sn12.66:8.4: Ye upadhiṃ vaḍḍhenti te dukkhaṃ vaḍḍhenti.
sn12.66:8.5: Ye dukkhaṃ vaḍḍhenti te na parimuccanti jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, na parimuccanti dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
sn12.66:9.1: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, āpānīyakaṃso vaṇṇasampanno gandhasampanno rasasampanno.
sn12.66:9.3: Atha puriso āgaccheyya ghammābhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipāsito.
sn12.66:9.5: ‘ayaṃ te, ambho purisa, āpānīyakaṃso vaṇṇasampanno gandhasampanno rasasampanno;
sn12.66:9.8: Pivato hi kho taṃ chādessati vaṇṇenapi gandhenapi rasenapi, pivitvā ca pana tatonidānaṃ maraṇaṃ vā nigacchasi maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhan’ti.
sn12.66:9.9: So taṃ āpānīyakaṃsaṃ sahasā appaṭisaṅkhā piveyya, nappaṭinissajjeyya.
sn12.66:9.10: So tatonidānaṃ maraṇaṃ vā nigaccheyya maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ.
sn12.66:9.11: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye hi keci atītamaddhānaṃ samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā yaṃ loke piyarūpaṃ …pe…
sn12.66:9.13: etarahi samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā yaṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ taṃ niccato passanti sukhato passanti attato passanti ārogyato passanti khemato passanti, te taṇhaṃ vaḍḍhenti.
sn12.66:9.14: Ye taṇhaṃ vaḍḍhenti te upadhiṃ vaḍḍhenti.
sn12.66:9.15: Ye upadhiṃ vaḍḍhenti te dukkhaṃ vaḍḍhenti.
sn12.66:9.16: Ye dukkhaṃ vaḍḍhenti te na parimuccanti jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, na parimuccanti dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
sn12.66:10.1: Ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, atītamaddhānaṃ samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā yaṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ taṃ aniccato addakkhuṃ dukkhato addakkhuṃ anattato addakkhuṃ rogato addakkhuṃ bhayato addakkhuṃ,
sn12.66:10.3: Ye taṇhaṃ pajahiṃsu te upadhiṃ pajahiṃsu.
sn12.66:10.4: Ye upadhiṃ pajahiṃsu te dukkhaṃ pajahiṃsu.
sn12.66:10.5: Ye dukkhaṃ pajahiṃsu te parimucciṃsu jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, parimucciṃsu dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
sn12.66:11.1: Yepi hi keci, bhikkhave, anāgatamaddhānaṃ samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā yaṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ taṃ aniccato dakkhissanti dukkhato dakkhissanti anattato dakkhissanti rogato dakkhissanti bhayato dakkhissanti,
sn12.66:12.1: Yepi hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā yaṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ taṃ aniccato passanti dukkhato passanti anattato passanti rogato passanti bhayato passanti,
sn12.66:12.3: Ye taṇhaṃ pajahanti te upadhiṃ pajahanti.
sn12.66:12.4: Ye upadhiṃ pajahanti te dukkhaṃ pajahanti.
sn12.66:12.5: Ye dukkhaṃ pajahanti te parimuccanti jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, parimuccanti dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
sn12.66:13.1: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, āpānīyakaṃso vaṇṇasampanno gandhasampanno rasasampanno.
sn12.66:13.3: Atha puriso āgaccheyya ghammābhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipāsito.
sn12.66:13.5: ‘ayaṃ te, ambho purisa, āpānīyakaṃso vaṇṇasampanno gandhasampanno rasasampanno so ca kho visena saṃsaṭṭho.
sn12.66:13.7: Pivato hi kho taṃ chādessati vaṇṇenapi gandhenapi rasenapi; pivitvā ca pana tatonidānaṃ maraṇaṃ vā nigacchasi maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhan’ti.
sn12.66:13.8: Atha kho, bhikkhave, tassa purisassa evamassa:
sn12.66:13.9: ‘sakkā kho me ayaṃ surāpipāsitā pānīyena vā vinetuṃ dadhimaṇḍakena vā vinetuṃ bhaṭṭhaloṇikāya vā vinetuṃ loṇasovīrakena vā vinetuṃ, na tvevāhaṃ taṃ piveyyaṃ, yaṃ mama assa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā’ti.
sn12.66:13.10: So taṃ āpānīyakaṃsaṃ paṭisaṅkhā na piveyya, paṭinissajjeyya.
sn12.66:13.11: So tatonidānaṃ na maraṇaṃ vā nigaccheyya maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ.
sn12.66:13.12: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye hi keci atītamaddhānaṃ samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā yaṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ taṃ aniccato addakkhuṃ dukkhato addakkhuṃ anattato addakkhuṃ rogato addakkhuṃ bhayato addakkhuṃ,
sn12.66:13.14: Ye taṇhaṃ pajahiṃsu te upadhiṃ pajahiṃsu.
sn12.66:13.15: Ye upadhiṃ pajahiṃsu te dukkhaṃ pajahiṃsu.
sn12.66:13.16: Ye dukkhaṃ pajahiṃsu te parimucciṃsu jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, parimucciṃsu dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
sn12.66:14.2: etarahi samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā yaṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ taṃ aniccato passanti dukkhato passanti anattato passanti rogato passanti bhayato passanti,
sn12.66:14.4: Ye taṇhaṃ pajahanti te upadhiṃ pajahanti.
sn12.66:14.5: Ye upadhiṃ pajahanti te dukkhaṃ pajahanti.
sn12.66:14.6: Ye dukkhaṃ pajahanti te parimuccanti jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, parimuccanti dukkhasmāti vadāmī”ti.
